name: Couscous With Eggplant
keywords: couscous, eggplant, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon finely chopped shallots or scallions
1 cup diced eggplant cut into 1/4-inch cubes
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the shallots, onions, turmeric, coriander, eggplant, salt and pepper. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring, until wilted, but do not brown.
Add the water, bring to a boil, add the couscous and blend well. Cover tightly, remove from the heat and let stand 5 minutes.
Add the butter and lemon juice, stir and blend with a fork to separate the grains. Keep warm.
